metadata.titel_preek: September 11, 2001: A Cross at Ground Zero

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The 'Stronger Man' (Christ) enters the 'Strong Man's' (Satan) house (the world) to bind him and plunder his goods (humanity) through the Cross.

tekstueel_bewijs: He is already doing it as he goes about exorcising demons
the decisive cosmic victory is not won until he is on the Cross
God disarmed the principalities and powers
source of salvation for the whole world
wrested Satan's goods away from him

zender.identificatie: God the Father / The Gospel (Hard News)
tekstueel_bewijs: God's Messiah in human history is hard news

ontvanger.identificatie: Fellow sinners; fellow saints; the world
tekstueel_bewijs: source of salvation for the whole world
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver (the plundered goods) and subsequently as a participant in the victory.

helper.identificatie: The Spirit of God / The Cross
tekstueel_bewijs: If it is by the Spirit of God that I cast out demons
a symbol of torture and death which... has become also our token of Christ's victory
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject (Christ) and the Helper (Spirit).
helper.rol_van_geest: The Spirit is the power by which the Subject acts.

tegenstander.identificatie: The Strong Man (Satan) / Cosmic Evil / Death
tekstueel_bewijs: the black smoke and orange flames of hell
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely bad habits but a 'Strong Man' and 'ruler of this world' requiring a cosmic intervention.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The 'Cross-shaped acts' of believers as a participation in and testimony to Christ's primary victory.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer (Firefighters, Todd Beamer, Bonhoeffer)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: Human action is framed as 'sharing in the victorious sacrifice of Jesus Christ.' The primary program (Christ's victory) enables the secondary (human courage).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: Christ → Plundering the House of the Strong Man

voorbeelden_god_subject: The Stronger Man has already gotten 'down here'
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Todd Beamer... spoke of his faith
Bonhoeffer... chose to return to Germany

voorbeelden: he wanted to be writing hard news
we know who holds the future
we do know where we are
enabled to act as a congregation
the future belongs to those who share in the victorious sacrifice

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the 'Power' (Pouvoir) of Christ that overcomes the 'Strong Man' and subsequently 'enables' human action.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (the inferno) to ~S1 (limbo/hunger) to S1 (Christ's victory) which produces ~S2 (sacrificial acts).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by Christ entering S2 to establish S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; S2 is described as 'the black smoke and orange flames of hell'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. Human heroes are presented not as independent subjects but as participants in Christ's prior action.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Todd Beamer... will be told for many years to come.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The Stronger Man has already gotten 'down here', with us.
Satan is not going to give up his domain without a struggle.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical and modern figures are used, but they are 'cross-shaped'—their power is derivative.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides a theocentric reading: God was present in their actions.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Security and courage derived from Christ's victory rather than self-effort.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The metaphor of the 'Stronger Man' perfectly integrates the 9/11 tragedy with the Gospel.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: God disarmed the principalities and powers... triumphing over them.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is the 'Pouvoir' (Power) of the Kingdom.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is a 'Strong Man' and an 'inferno' that humans cannot escape alone.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon maintains a strict hierarchy where Christ is the Subject of salvation and humans are the beneficiaries who then reflect His action.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is appropriate for a crisis context.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in 'Hard News' preaching, where the tragedy of 9/11 is not the main story, but the backdrop for the greater story of Christ's cosmic victory.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the pathos of the 9/11 stories, Greimas reveals that these stories function as 'secondary programs' dependent on the 'primary' Christus Victor program.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the 'Strong Man' parable; semiotics shows how the preacher maps that parable onto the current events to reassign agency to God.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas highlights that the 'Cross' is not just a symbol here, but a 'Helper' that mediates the 'Subject's' (Christ) victory to the 'Receiver' (the congregation).

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids the 'If we... then God' trap by using the 'Already' of the Cross.
